intents.response: Admissions open in July. Apply online through our official portal.
We offer programs in Computer Science, Engineering, and Business.
Fee structures are available on the website, depending on your chosen program.
You can email us at info@university.edu or call +92-300-0000000.
We are located in Islamabad, Pakistan.
